general.disclaimer_text_html:
If you need any help, please visit our FAQs .
Please note UK customers will now have £1.99 deducted from their refund total to cover return costs.
This is a service email and you are receiving it regardless of your marketing communication preferences.

order_confirmation.title: Thank you for your purchase!
order_confirmation.delivery_method_pick_up: You’ll receive an email when your order is ready for pickup.
order_confirmation.delivery_method_local: Hi {{ customer_first_name }}, we're getting your order ready for delivery.
order_confirmation.delivery_method_standard: Hi {{ customer_first_name }}, we're getting your order ready to be shipped. We will notify you when it has been sent.

order_edited.title: Your order was updated
order_edited.message_name: Hi {{ customer_first_name }}, your order has now been updated.
order_edited.message_standard: Your order has now been updated.

order_edited_invoice.title: Payment needed to update order
order_edited_invoice.message: An additional payment of {{ order_total_outstanding }} is needed to update your order.

order_invoice.title: Payment of {{ order_total_outstanding }} is needed
order_invoice.message: An additional payment of {{ order_total_outstanding }} is needed to update your order.

order_cancelled.title: We're really sorry! Unfortunately your order has been cancelled.
order_cancelled.message_voided_customer: Order {{ name }} was canceled at your request and your payment has been voided.
order_cancelled.message_voided_inventory: Order {{ name }} was canceled because we did not have enough stock to fulfill your order and your payment has been voided.
order_cancelled.message_voided_fraud: Order {{ name }} Unfortunately your order has been cancelled and refunded as it hasn't passed our security checks. This usually happens if your billing address doesn't match the address your card is registered with, or you've attempted multiple transactions. Your refund should be back in your account within 48 hours, but can sometimes take up to 7 working days depending on your bank. If you have any concerns, please get in touch.
order_cancelled.message_voided_other: Order {{ name }} was canceled because of unforseen circumstances and your payment has been voided.
order_cancelled.message_refunded_customer: Order {{ name }} was canceled at your request and your payment has been refunded.
order_cancelled.message_refunded_inventory: Order {{ name }} was canceled because we did not have enough stock to fulfill your order and your payment has been refunded.
order_cancelled.message_refunded_fraud: Order {{ name }} was canceled because we suspect it is fraudulent and your payment has been refunded.
order_cancelled.message_refunded_other: Order {{ name }} was canceled because of unforseen circumstances and your payment has been refunded.

order_refund.title_part_refund: Some items in your order have been refunded
order_refund.message_customer_html:
Hi {{ customer_first_name }}, here is the total amount refunded: {{ amount }}
Please allow 3-7 working days for the funds to show back in your account.
order_refund.message_standard_html:
Total amount refunded: {{ amount }}
Please allow 3-7 working days for the funds to show back in your account.

draft_order_invoice.title: Did you leave something behind?
draft_order_invoice.message_items_html: These items will be reserved for you until: {{ reserve_inventory_until }}.
draft_order_invoice.message_item_html: This item will be reserved for you until: {{ reserve_inventory_until }}.

email_cart_from_pos.title: Are you ready to complete your order?

abandoned_checkout.title_single: You left an item in your bag
abandoned_checkout.title_multi: You left items in your bag
abandoned_checkout.message_billing_item: Hi {{ billing_address_first_name }}, you added an item to your shopping bag and haven't completed your purchase. You can complete it now while it's still available.
abandoned_checkout.message_billing_items: Hi {{ billing_address_first_name }}, you added items to your shopping bag and haven't completed your purchase. You can complete it now while they're still available.
abandoned_checkout.message_item: Hi, you added an item to your shopping bag and haven't completed your purchase. You can complete it now while it's still available.
abandoned_checkout.message_items: Hi, you added items to your shopping bag and haven't completed your purchase. You can complete it now while they're still available.

Treat yourself or send it to someone else as a gift.

payment_error.title: Your payment couldn’t be processed
payment_error.message: You added items to your shopping cart but the payment couldn’t be processed. You haven’t been charged. You can still return to your cart to complete your purchase.

shipping_confirmation.message_one_item: One item in your order is on the way. We'll send you an email in the next 24 hours regarding the rest of your items. Track your shipment to see the delivery status.

local_delivered.title: Your order has been delivered
local_delivered.message_html: Haven’t received your package yet? Let us know.

We weren’t able to deliver your order.

shipping_delivered.not_received_html: Haven't received your package yet? <a href="mailto:{{ shop_email }}">Let us know

confirmation_email.title: Confirm you want to receive email marketing
confirmation_email.message: You need to confirm that you want to receive marketing updates from us. If you didn’t subscribe, then you don’t need to do anything.

customer_account_invite.title: Account activation
customer_account_invite.message_customer_html: Hi {{ customer_first_name }}, you've created a new customer account at {{ shop_name }}.
customer_account_invite.message_standard_html: You've created a new customer account at {{ shop_name }}.

customer_account_welcome.title: Welcome to {{ shop_name }}!
customer_account_welcome.message_html:
You've activated your customer account.
Next time you shop with us, log in for faster checkout.

customer_account_password.title: Reset your password
customer_account_password.message_html:
Follow this link to reset your customer account password.
If you didn't request a new password, you can safely delete this email.

customer_payment_method_update_request.title: Confirm your payment information
customer_payment_method_update_request.message_html: Hi {{ customer_first_name }}, to keep your orders from {{ shop_name }} active, confirm your payment information.

return_label.title_shopify: Your return shipping label is ready
return_label.message_shopify_html: Print your return shipping label and attach it to the package containing your return items.
return_label.message_manual_html:
We've sent you a return shipping label, or you will receive one soon.
Once you receive your return shipping label, get your returned items and follow the instructions to complete your return.
return_label.shopify_step_2_html: Print your return shipping label and attach it to the package. Cover or remove any old shipping labels.
return_label.shopify_step_3_standard_html: Give the package to the carrier identified on the label.
return_label.manual_step_2_html: Print your return shipping label. If you haven’t received it yet, we’ll send it to you soon.
return_label.manual_step_3_html: Attach the label to the package. Cover or remove any old shipping labels.
return_label.manual_step_4_standard_html: Give the package to the carrier identified on the label.
return_label.manual_step_5_html: Track your return using your tracking number to make sure we get it.

return_label_instructions.title: Your return label is ready
return_label_instructions.message: To print order {{ order_name }} please follow these basic instructions:
return_label_instructions.instructions_2: 2. Print your return label and attach it to the package.
return_label_instructions.instructions_3: 3. Give the package to the carrier identified on the label.

thank_you.contact_us_html: Need help? Chat to our bot or visit our Help page
